question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. white digital billboard
B. bicycle
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The white digital billboard is on a distant building in the background, while the bicycle is on a sidewalk closer to the foreground, making depth judgment from a 2D image ambiguous without a depth map.
